USE_FAHRENHEIT.name: use-fahrenheit
USE_FAHRENHEIT.comment: When enabled, all in-game temperatures will be displayed in Fahrenheit instead of Celsius. Uses the NIST-standard conversion formula.

DECIMAL_PLACES.name: decimal-places
DECIMAL_PLACES.comment: Number of decimal places to display for converted temperatures. Set to 0 for whole numbers, 1 or 2 for more precision.
